channel.title: Devolution special bar
channel.description:
I feel like a complete idiot posting this. But the special bar on my server (Devolution 7.8) doesn't go down, lol.
Pretty much means infinite special for all weapons. I don't want people to rape each other using a Godsword and whatnot.
I find it sad that I can't figure this out myself.
I'm not asking on how to actually do it, I'm asking for something to point me in the right direction. If you tell me everything that I have to do, I wont learn, so I prefer just getting a few hints, or whatever.
